title: 495 Near to the Heart of God

lines: 1. There is a place of quiet rest, Near to the heart of God, A place where sin cannot molest, Near to the heart of God.
Refrain : O Jesus, blest Redeemer, Sent from the heart of God, Hold us, who wait before Thee, Near to the heart of God.
2. There is a place of comfort sweet, Near to the heart of God, A place where we our Saviour meet, Near to the heart of God.
3. There is a place of full release, Near to the heart of God, A place where all is joy and peace, Near to the heart of God.
